problem.markdown:
>>True or False: The way to make sure someone has learned something is to tell them it.<<
( ) True (x) False ( ) Well, actually...
[explanation] Learning a thing is not the act of being told that thing. Evaluating learning is not as simple as counting up all the places you told someone the thing. [explanation]
